scripts.build:desktop: swift build --package-path desktop/blog && swift build --package-path desktop/chat && swift build --package-path desktop/movie && swift build --package-path desktop/org
scripts.fix: bun format && bun lint:ts:fix && bun format && (O=$(turbo typecheck build --output-logs=errors-only 2>&1) || { echo "$O"; false; }) && bun format:swift && bun lint:swift
scripts.lint:swift: (swiftlint lint --fix > /dev/null 2>&1 || true) && (O=$(swiftlint lint --strict 2>&1) || { echo "$O"; false; }) && (O=$(yamllint . 2>&1) || { echo "$O"; false; })
scripts.test:all: bun fix && CONVEX_TEST_MODE=true bun --cwd packages/be with-env convex dev --once && bun --cwd packages/be with-env convex env set CONVEX_TEST_MODE true && SKIP_CONVEX_ENV_TOGGLE=1 turbo run test; EXIT=$?; bun --cwd packages/be with-env convex env remove CONVEX_TEST_MODE; exit $EXIT
scripts.test:desktop: swift test --package-path swift-core && swift test --package-path desktop/shared
